label: Lost Adams Diggings (Location unknown)

latitude: The Victorio Peak treasure refers to a legendary cache of gold reportedly discovered in 1937 by prospector Doc Noss in New Mexico’s Victorio Peak. Despite numerous expeditions and legal disputes
longitude: no verified recovery of the treasure has ever been documented.
